
= Yad with html support Gemini =
=====================================
_dependencies_
``
	sudo apt-get install autoconf automake libtool pkg-config gtk+-3.0 libgtk-3-dev intltool xmllint html2text
``
_xmlint not on MX_
``
	wget https://github.com/yad-dialog/yad/archive/refs/heads/master.zip
	unzip master.zip
	cd yad-master
	./configure --enable-html
	make 
	sudo make install
``
_verification_
``
	yad --version
``
=====================================
